description: Mapping the controller channels from the head to the android to play head animations on the full body android.

mapping.description: UpperEyelid Close/Open -> UpperEyelid Close/Open (left and right separately)
Eyeball Left/Right -> Eyeball Left/Right (left and right separately)
LowerEyelid Close/Open -> LowerEyelid Close/Open (left and right separately)
MouthCorner Up/Down -> MouthCorner Up/Down (left and right)
